page.title: 14SOUTH WEST MEAT AT CHARD
page.content: South - West - Meat is situated at the end of Chard's industrial Estate. It covers 3-3\ acres which used to be marsh land,The site is based on concrete. In the factory there are a lot of different rooms for each different job such as : cutting the meat, cooling and packing. There are 392 workers in the factory 35% of them are women. South West Meat do all different kinds of meat such as:steer,3 grades of cow,lamb,and pig. They deliver to all parts of England, and Wales, to Greece and Germany and they also deliver to supermarkets, such as:Marks and Spencers and Tescos. In a week 1500 head of cattle, 2500 lambs, 708 pigs, are delivered to South West Meat,this averages about 250 tons.
